scripts.dev: obelisk hello && pnpm run localnode && sleep 15 && ts-node scripts/generateAccount.ts && obelisk faucet --network local && obelisk publish --network local --configPath ./assets/Scripts/obelisk.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts local && tail -f localnode.nohup.out
scripts.world-publsih-localnet: obelisk publish --network local --configPath ./assets/Scripts/obelisk.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts local
scripts.world-publsih-devnet: obelisk publish --network devnet --configPath ./assets/Scripts/obelisk.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts devnet
scripts.world-publsih-testnet: obelisk publish --network testnet --configPath ./assets/Scripts/obelisk.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts testnet
scripts.world-publsih-mainnet: obelisk publish --network mainnet --configPath ./assets/Scripts/obelisk.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts mainnet
scripts.world-upgrade-localnet: obelisk upgrade --network local --configPath ./assets/Scripts/obelisk.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts local
scripts.world-upgrade-devnet: obelisk upgrade --network devnet --configPath ./assets/Scripts/obelisk.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts devnet
scripts.world-upgrade-testnet: obelisk upgrade --network testnet --configPath ./assets/Scripts/obelisk.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts testnet
scripts.world-upgrade-mainnet: obelisk upgrade --network mainnet --configPath ./assets/Scripts/obelisk.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts mainnet
